tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE music_streaming_statistics(
    user_id UUID,
    song_id UUID,
    play_count INT,
    last_played TIMESTAMP
)
CREATE TABLE artists (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), genre VARCHAR(255), popularity INT);
CREATE TABLE songs (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), artist_id INT, release_date DATE, plays INT);

CREATE TABLE user_interaction (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    song_id UUID,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
 user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
 subscription_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE songs (
 song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 song_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 artist VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 genre VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 release_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
 interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT NOT NULL,
 song_id INT NOT NULL,
 interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 interaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE play_history (
 play_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT NOT NULL,
 song_id INT NOT NULL,
 play_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
 play_duration INT
)
CREATE TABLE Artists (artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY, artist_name VARCHAR(255), genre VARCHAR(100), start_year INT);
CREATE TABLE Albums (album_id INT PRIMARY KEY, album_name VARCHAR(255), release_year INT, artist_id INT REFERENCES Artists(artist_id));
CREATE TABLE Songs (song_id INT PRIMARY KEY, song_name VARCHAR(255), duration INT, album_id INT REFERENCES Albums(album_id));
CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), registration_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE UserInteractions (interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES Users(user_id), song_id INT REFERENCES Songs(song_id), interaction_type VARCHAR(50), interaction_date TIMESTAMP);
